pullrequest.title: Manager with Camera sensor and example

content.raw:
I recently removed `Camera::ImageDepth` in ign-rendering. In gazebo, we've been mistreating it as number of channels but it's not really what image depth means. For now, you can replace the calculation for `step` with:

~~~
this->dataPtr->camera->ImageWidth() * rendering::PixelUtil::BytesPerPixel(this->dataPtr->camera->ImageFormat())
~~~
